articles.description: Follow text updates and radio commentary from 19:30 BST as England face Argentina to decide the third-placed team at the Rugby World Cup.
articles.title: Rugby World Cup: England play Argentina for third place - build-up

articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary as England face Belgium in the Nations League
articles.title: Nations League: England v Belgium - team news & build-up

articles.description: Follow live text commentary as Premier League leaders Tottenham visit Crystal Palace
articles.title: Premier League: Crystal Palace v Tottenham - team news & build-up

articles.description: Scotland seek their first win in Women's Nations League Group A1 against the Dutch. Watch TV coverage and follow live text.
articles.title: Women's Nations League: Netherlands v Scotland - TV & text coverage

articles.description: Follow live text and audio commentary from first and second practice at the Mexico City Grand Prix.
articles.title: Mexican Grand Prix first practice - radio & text

articles.description: Rizwan sends reminders of Jonny Bairstow's stumping at Lord's by running Markram out but not appealing during Pakistan's Cricket World Cup match against South Africa.
articles.title: 'Lord's all over again!' - Rizwan and the stumping that wasn't

articles.description: South Africa cling on to beat Pakistan by one wicket in the best game of the World Cup so far.
articles.title: South Africa defy Pakistan to stay on course for semis

articles.description: Germany thrash Wales 5-1 in Sinsheim as Gemma Grainger's side conceded five goals for the second successive Nations League game.
articles.title: Wales hammered by Germany in Nations League

articles.description: Hanna Nemeth scores a last-minute winner as Hungary defeat Northern Ireland 3-2 in the Women's Nations League in Gyor.
articles.title: Late drama as Hungary beat Northern Ireland

articles.description: Former Aston Villa and Everton winger Anwar El Ghazi will have his contract terminated at Mainz for a social media post about the Israel-Gaza conflict.
articles.title: Mainz to end El Ghazi contract over Israel-Gaza post
